item.title: Building LLVM and Clang on macOS 10.14.6 with Xcode 11.1
item.description: I recently attended the 2019 LLVM Developer Meeting: After the first hour, spent listening to the keynote called “Generating Optimized Code with GlobalISel” my brain hurt, but… it was that good kind of pain, like the one you get after a particularly hard workout. By the end of the day, after having seen several more talks, I was psyched up! Naturally, when I went home and immediately tried to build LLVM on my macBook Pro running macOS 10.
